pr_title: [#10245] Per Question CSV Download in Session Result

timeline.message: Update CSEET href link
Merge branch 'master' into 10245-csv-question-download
Add questionId to csv download method
Add download event emitter to base classes
Add download event emitter to question text
Add handling of download to response views
Add handling of download to specific view
Add handling of download to root page
Style question text with info
Update snapshots and fix lint issues

timeline.author: Derek-Hardy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,11 @@ <h3>{{ teamInfo.key }} Statistics for {{ isGqr ? 'Given' : 'Received' }} Respons
               <div class="card-header bg-info text-white">
                 <tm-question-text-with-info [questionNumber]="question.feedbackQuestion.questionNumber"
                                             [questionDetails]="question.feedbackQuestion.questionDetails"
-                                            (click)="$event.stopPropagation()"></tm-question-text-with-info>
+                                            (click)="$event.stopPropagation()"
+                                            (downloadQuestionResultEvent)="triggerDownloadQuestionResult(
+                                            question.feedbackQuestion.questionNumber,
+                                            question.feedbackQuestion.feedbackQuestionId);"

timeline.author: Derek-Hardy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -76,7 +80,11 @@

{{ teamInfo.key }} Detailed Responses

+ (click)="$event.stopPropagation()" + (downloadQuestionResultEvent)="triggerDownloadQuestionResult( + question.questionOutput.feedbackQuestion.questionNumber, + question.questionOutput.feedbackQuestion.feedbackQuestionId);"

replies.bodyText: The indentations follow that of the components below/above it. Maybe it appears weirdly in the git viewer?
replies.author: t-cheepeng

timeline.bodyText: We can probably standardise the style
timeline.author: Derek-Hardy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,10 @@
 <div class="card margin-bottom-15px" *ngFor="let question of questionsOrder">
   <div class="card-header bg-info text-white course-tab-header" (click)="toggleAndLoadTab.emit(question.question.feedbackQuestionId)">
-    <tm-question-text-with-info [questionNumber]="question.question.questionNumber" [questionDetails]="question.question.questionDetails"></tm-question-text-with-info>
+    <tm-question-text-with-info
+        [questionNumber]="question.question.questionNumber"
+        [questionDetails]="question.question.questionDetails"
+        (downloadQuestionResultEvent)="triggerDownloadQuestionResult({questionNumber: question.question.questionNumber, questionId: question.question.feedbackQuestionId})"

timeline.author: Derek-Hardy

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' into 10245-csv-question-download

timeline.bodyText: Not part of what is described in the issue title, but I will close one eye as this is still part of UAT fix

timeline.diffHunk:

Not for Profit:

Well Received by the Academic Community:

TEAMMATES has been presented, and well-received, in education-related conferences such as the - International Conference on Software Engineering Education and Training (CSEET), + International Conference on Software Engineering Education and Training (CSEET),

timeline.bodyText: Only this needs to be changed, i.e. everything else should remain as they were previously.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,13 @@
 <div class="card margin-bottom-15px" *ngFor="let question of questionsOrder">
   <div class="card-header bg-info text-white course-tab-header" (click)="toggleAndLoadTab.emit(question.question.feedbackQuestionId)">
     <div class="row">
-      <tm-question-text-with-info class="col-md-11" [questionNumber]="question.question.questionNumber" [questionDetails]="question.question.questionDetails"></tm-question-text-with-info>
+      <tm-question-text-with-info class="col-md-11"
+        [questionNumber]="question.question.questionNumber"
+        [questionDetails]="question.question.questionDetails"
+        (downloadQuestionResultEvent)="triggerDownloadQuestionResult({
+        questionNumber: question.question.questionNumber,
+        questionId: question.question.feedbackQuestionId})"
+      ></tm-question-text-with-info>
